mapper.select: select * from member where id=#{id} and pass=#{pass}
select * from member order by member_idx desc
mapper.insert: insert into member(name, id, pass, email, phone) values(#{name}, #{id}, #{pass}, #{email}, #{phone})
mapper.update: update member set email = #{email}, phone =#{phone} where member_idx = #{member_idx}
update member set pass = #{pass} where member_idx = #{member_idx}
